pkgmetadata.longdescription: Persistent Data Anonymization Pipeline // A framework for the replicable removal of personally identifiable data (PID) in data sets. The package implements a suite of methods to suit different data types based on the suggestions of Garfinkel (2015) doi:10.6028/NIST.IR.8053 and the ICO "Guidelines on Anonymization" (2012) https://ico.org.uk/media/1061/anonymisation-code.pdf.
